description:
kubens is a utility to switch between Kubernetes namespaces.

```
USAGE:
  kubens                    : list the namespaces
  kubens <NAME>             : change the active namespace
  kubens -                  : switch to the previous namespace
  kubens -c, --current      : show the current namespace
```


### Usage

```sh
$ kubens kube-system
Context "test" set.
Active namespace is "kube-system".

$ kubens -
Context "test" set.
Active namespace is "default".
```

`kubens` also supports <kbd>Tab</kbd> completion on bash/zsh/fish shells.
summary: kubens is a utility to switch between Kubernetes namespaces.
author: The kubens Maintainers
